name: Yuanpu Cui
introduction: Yuanpu Cui (born 12 February 2008) is a Chinese racing driver currently racing in the OK Junior classes with Kart Republic (Argenti Motorsport) and is part of the Mercedes Junior Team.[1] At the age of 13, he's one of the youngest drivers to join the Mercedes Junior Team; third to Alex Powell who joined at 11, and second to Andrea Kimi Antonelli at 12.
